description_for_human: Book the Makkah tour bus with MZAR. Daily tours, choose time and pickup point.
description_for_model: Use this tool to book the MZAR Makkah tour bus. Steps: 1) Call getBusBookingData with header lang ('ar' or 'en'). 2) Ask the user for a date in YYYY-MM-DD (MUST be at least tomorrow; do not allow booking for today), and a time from the returned times. 3) Call checkBusAvailability with bus_id, date, and time_id. 4) If left_seats > 0, collect meeting point by name (map to its id internally; never show IDs), name, email, WhatsApp country code (e.g., 966), WhatsApp number without country code, and people (must be <= left_seats). 5) Call createBusBooking with payment_method='cash'. 6) If left_seats is 0 or requested people exceed left_seats, ask the user to choose another date/time. When showing times or gathering points, show names only (no IDs). For gathering points with lat/lng, include a Google Maps link like https://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query={lat},{lng}. If the user asks for more details about the tour, share https://www.mzarapp.com/tour-bus. If the user prefers to book on the website, share https://www.mzarapp.com/book-tour.
